name: genericmock
short_description:
generic mock is a project whose aim is to provide useful bits of code. Usually these parts are always rewritten each time a project starts.

They are ready to be incorporated into larger projects without the need to link to a larger library.

Everything is provided under BSD license so you don't need to worry about incorporating this into your commercial application.

Bits of code:

- redirecting standard streams (stdin, stdout, stderr)
- getting access to a program's streams
- run parallel tasks
....

Visit the wiki for details: https://sourceforge.net/p/genericmock/wiki/Home/

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: BSD License
